Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the attack on Hindus by referring to the individuals involved as "goons" and implying that it was a widespread incident.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photos were taken at two different protests, neither of which were related to Mamata Banerjee or her party.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the attack on Hindus was carried out by workers employed by Banerjee or her party.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photos are evidence of an attack on Hindus by Banerjee's "goons" without providing any substantial proof.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photos were taken at unrelated protests and have been misused to falsely claim an attack on Hindus by Banerjee's supporters.
